title: Yeah right, RIOT totaly doesnt sell power with skins...
body:
Have you seen Dragon Tamer Tristanas Death animation? 
I AM STILL CRYING!

NOONE will be able to kill Tristana with this skin, and even if, afterwards, they will all be stunned by the feels so hard, that the enemy team can just roll over them! 

This skin is totaly pay to win...

http://cdn.yourepeat.com/media/gif/002/751/021/34325d4d3cff3105d8368e525ac34e4f.gif

Fuck RIOT, I dont play your game to feel *cries*

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hlKquczv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-13T10:28:17.965+0000)
>
> NOONE will be able to kill Tristana with this skin, and even if, afterwards, they will all be stunned by the feels so hard, that the enemy team can just roll over them! 

{{champion:236}} "I'll have no trouble killing you, and less trouble killing you again!"
I mean, I think it'd be worse if Riggles died. D:

After Tristana's death... Riggles went into a deep and depressive state, he quit is job, and stopped all social activities...
All he did was lay in his dirty old, ragged bed in his old apartment, all he did was sleep.. He didn't even eat, he only got up to use the bathroom.


riggles did die, on the inside ):
Oh. My. God. {{item:3073}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hlKquczv,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-13T17:54:08.652+0000)
>
> I mean, I think it'd be worse if Riggles died. D:

hmmm any insight on what Shyvana's view on/about Riggles is?
That's a good question. I'd ask her myself, but I'm afraid of being burned. >_>
{{champion:102}} "TRIST, YOU STOLE MY DOG"

Like any assassin has a reason to feel such petty things as emotions?

Seriously though: Yeah it has feels... But do you feel this bad when you kill {{champion:60}}'s precious spiderlings? {{champion:82}}'s pet Dragon or ghost slave of your ally? {{champion:143}}'s beloved plants? Or  when you kill {{champion:83}}'s doomed ghouls?
They are not cute and they dont do THAT

First part: "Cute" is a matter of opinion.

Second part: That is very true.

Though I will most likely be getting this skin when i get a chance I'm getting it due to how NICE the skin looks. And due to the funny dragon interactions for emotes. If this game was pay to win you could pay to make death timers last forever... Which it isn't thankfully.

When i first saw this from SkinSpotlights though i did go : "Awww... Thats sadly adorably cute.." =( "I'll feel bad... AFTER I RUN AWAY FORM HER TEAM!"
You do realise that I was joking about "Pay2Win"?

Some skins do have slightly better animations though for different things... So...

I felt like this when I first read your original post: http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/9869953.jpg (more or less)

Good to know you where joking though!
only the spiders and plants are alive...
wish I could kill the dragon too

Honestly, lets be rational here.

What if one of the minions just picks up the dragon and resumes fire?
when this skin comes out a lot of people are going to be extra careful, poor Riggles.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

MFW you copied somebody else's thread.
http://i.imgur.com/8DvHeWx.jpg
which thread?
Well.. it is a bit too much of feels indeed... It could have been more funny with the dragon jumping up with X.X face...
Kawaii overdose {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
